subject: Public Speaking
title: The Transformation
description: A tiny lesson with a big payoff: The Transformation.

hook.text: The hero returns changed. That's the whole point of the journey.

buildup.text: In speeches, transformation is your message made human.

discovery.text: Show who you were before and who you became after.

twist.text: The bigger the gap between before and after, the stronger the story.

climax.text: Transformation proves your message is real, not theoretical.

quiz.question: What makes transformation powerful?
options: It proves the message through lived change
